code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Spinner from"../components/Spinner";import Product from"../components/Product";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const API_URL="https://fakestoreapi.com/products";const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);async function fetchProductData(){setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch(API_URL);const data=await res.json();setPosts(data);}catch(error){alert("error in api call");setPosts([]);}setLoading(false);}useEffect(()=>{fetchProductData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{}):posts.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid  xs:gridcols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 max-w-6xl p-2 \r mx-auto space-y-10 space-x-5 min-h-[80vh]",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Product,{post:post},post.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No Data Found"})})});};export default Home;
